mapper.select: select * from (select rownum R, F.* from (select * from FREEBOARD) F) where R between #{startRow} and #{lastRow}
mapper.insert: insert into FREEBOARD (NUM, WRITER, TITLE, CONTENTS, REG_DATE, HIT, REF, STEP, DEPTH) values(point_seq.nextval,#{writer},#{title},#{contents},SYSDATE,0,point_seq.currval,0,0)
mapper.update: update FREEBOARD set TITLE=#{title}, CONTENTS=#{contents}, REG_DATE=SYSDATE where NUM=#{num}
